issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/
2. Tap profile- preferences
3. Toggle on forced offline
4. Navigate to LHN
5. Tap on a report with emoji badge used in conversation
6. Send a message
7. Long press the message sent and select any suggested emoji to note that added badge is greyed out
8. From above conversation with emoji badge used, tap on emoji picker near by and select it.
9. Note the applied emoji badge is not greyed out
10. From emoji picker, select any emoji for message sent in offline again

Expected result: In offline, emoji badge must be greyed out when applied to the message sent in online/offline.

Actual result: None
